SELECT AVG(budget_amount) AS budgetAvg, MAX(CASE WHEN budget_month = #{budgetMonth}-1 THEN budget_amount END) AS budgetAmountX, MAX(CASE WHEN budget_month = #{budgetMonth}-2 THEN budget_amount END) AS budgetAmountXx, MAX(CASE WHEN budget_month = #{budgetMonth}-3 THEN budget_amount END) AS budgetAmountXxx FROM Secretary_Budget WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND budget_year = #{budgetYear} AND budget_month BETWEEN #{budgetMonth}-3 AND #{budgetMonth}-1

SELECT st.trans_id AS trans_id, st.cashbook_id AS cashbook_id, st.user_id AS user_id, st.family_id AS family_id, TO_CHAR(st.trans_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS trans_date, TO_CHAR(st.trans_date, 'HH24:MI') AS trans_time, st.trans_type AS trans_type, st.cate1_id AS cate1_id, st.cate2_id AS cate2_id, stc1.cate1_name AS cate1_name, stc2.cate2_name AS cate2_name, st.trans_payee AS trans_payee, st.trans_memo AS trans_memo, st.trans_amount AS trans_amount, stc1.label_color AS label_color FROM Secretary_Transaction st LEFT JOIN Secretary_Trans_Category1 stc1 ON st.cate1_id = stc1.cate1_id LEFT JOIN Secretary_Trans_Category2 stc2 ON st.cate2_id = stc2.cate2_id WHERE st.family_id = #{familyId} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trans_date) = #{calYear} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trans_date) = #{calMonth} AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM trans_date) = #{calDate}
AND st.trans_type = '지출'
AND st.trans_type = '수입'
ORDER BY st.trans_date DESC

SELECT t.family_id, tc1.cate1_name, tc1.label_color AS label_color, SUM(t.trans_amount) AS total_month_expense FROM Secretary_Transaction t JOIN Secretary_Trans_Category1 tc1 ON t.cate1_id = tc1.cate1_id WHERE t.family_id = #{familyId} AND t.trans_type = '지출' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t.trans_date) = #{chYear} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM t.trans_date) = #{chMonth} GROUP BY t.family_id, tc1.cate1_name, tc1.label_color ORDER BY total_month_expense DESC

SELECT t.family_id, tc1.cate1_name, tc1.label_color AS label_color, SUM(t.trans_amount) AS total_month_income FROM Secretary_Transaction t JOIN Secretary_Trans_Category1 tc1 ON t.cate1_id = tc1.cate1_id WHERE t.family_id = #{familyId} AND t.trans_type = '수입' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t.trans_date) = #{chYear} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM t.trans_date) = #{chMonth} GROUP BY t.family_id, tc1.cate1_name, tc1.label_color ORDER BY total_month_income DESC

SELECT 1 AS family_id, '2023' AS curYear, '09' AS curMonth, TO_CHAR(t.trans_date, 'W') AS week_of_month, SUM(t.trans_amount) AS total_week_expense, SUM(SUM(t.trans_amount)) OVER (ORDER BY TO_CHAR(t.trans_date, 'W')) AS week_accumulated_expense FROM Secretary_Transaction t WHERE t.family_id = #{familyId} AND t.trans_type = '지출' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t.trans_date) = #{chYear} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM t.trans_date) = #{chMonth} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(t.trans_date, 'W') ORDER BY week_of_month ASC

WITH BudgetInfo AS ( SELECT family_id, budget_year, budget_month, SUM(budget_amount) AS budget_amount FROM Secretary_Budget WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND ((budget_year = #{chYear} AND budget_month BETWEEN #{chMonth}-5 AND #{chMonth}) OR (budget_year = #{chYear}-1 AND budget_month = 12)) GROUP BY family_id, budget_year, budget_month ), IncomeInfo AS ( SELECT family_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trans_date) AS trans_year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trans_date) AS trans_month, SUM(trans_amount) AS total_month_income FROM Secretary_Transaction WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND trans_type = '수입' AND trans_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{chYear} || '-' || #{chMonth} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), -5) AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{chYear} || '-' || #{chMonth} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) GROUP BY family_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trans_date), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trans_date) ), ExpenseInfo AS ( SELECT family_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trans_date) AS trans_year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trans_date) AS trans_month, SUM(trans_amount) AS total_month_expense FROM Secretary_Transaction WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND trans_type = '지출' AND trans_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{chYear} || '-' || #{chMonth} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), -5) AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{chYear} || '-' || #{chMonth} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) GROUP BY family_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trans_date), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trans_date) ) SELECT b.family_id, b.budget_year AS curYear, b.budget_month AS curMonth, b.budget_amount, COALESCE(i.total_month_income, 0) AS total_month_income, COALESCE(e.total_month_expense, 0) AS total_month_expense, (b.budget_amount - COALESCE(e.total_month_expense, 0)) AS budget_vs_expense, CASE WHEN (b.budget_amount - COALESCE(e.total_month_expense, 0)) >= 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS budget_success, (COALESCE(i.total_month_income, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_month_expense, 0)) AS income_vs_expense, CASE WHEN (COALESCE(i.total_month_income, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_month_expense, 0)) >= 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS in_ex_success FROM BudgetInfo b LEFT JOIN IncomeInfo i ON b.family_id = i.family_id AND b.budget_year = i.trans_year AND b.budget_month = i.trans_month LEFT JOIN ExpenseInfo e ON b.family_id = e.family_id AND b.budget_year = e.trans_year AND b.budget_month = e.trans_month ORDER BY b.budget_year DESC, b.budget_month DESC
